law.catch_line: ** CONTINGENCY - NOT IN EFFECT - CHAPTER 371 OF 2002 **...
law.text:
** CONTINGENCY - NOT IN EFFECT - CHAPTER 371 OF 2002 **
In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Core service agency" has the meaning stated in § 10-1201 of this title.
"Crisis Response System" means the Maryland Mental Health Crisis Response System.
